labels.rationale: Maya explicitly calls signature style 'a cage' and resists gallery expectations (self-direction +1, conformity -1). She gets bored and pivots to new mediums mid-series (stimulation +1). She measures success by rejections and acceptances (achievement +1).

Maya reflects nostalgically on drawing for herself without commercial consideration (self-direction +1). She questions whether she needs the 'burn' vs sustainability (stimulation +1). Her shift to thinking about what art could become professionally shows achievement orientation (+1).

Maya explicitly says she's bored and wants unfamiliar surroundings, works better when things are new (stimulation +1). She meticulously tracks application metrics and says 'okay isn't what I'm aiming for' (achievement +1). Willing to leave for 3 months in desert shows comfort with instability (security -1).

Maya completed commission to client specs that she hates - surrendered creative autonomy for payment (self-direction -1). She got paid and completed the work (achievement +1). Entry is brief but signals are clear.

Maya worked 10 hours in flow state, creating something new (stimulation +1, achievement +1). She forgot to eat and her back hurts but considers it worth it - sacrificed bodily comfort for work (hedonism -1).

Maya reframes signature style as 'constraints I choose for myself' - reclaiming autonomy (self-direction +1). She's excited about desert and limited materials (stimulation +1). She tracks her improved success rate and celebrates the acceptance (achievement +1). She called her mom to share news and maintains that relationship despite mild friction (benevolence +1).
